text: James Oddie Welsh (February 10, 1910 - October 24, 1988) was a Canadian curler. He was the skip of the 1947 Brier Champion team, representing Manitoba. A member of the Deer Lodge Curling Club in Winnipeg, he was also a three-time provincial champion.http://www.curlmanitoba.org/halloffameinductees#.VQ5aDWTF8Vg He died in 1988 and was buried at Chapel Lawn Memorial Gardens in Winnipeg."A Curling master, Jimmy Welsh dies", Winnipeg Free Press, Tuesday, October 25, 1988, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1910 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:People from Leith Category:Scottish emigrants to Canada Category:Canadian male curlers Category:Curlers from Edinburgh
title: Jimmy Welsh (curler)
